ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(StageName) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Signed'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Executed'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won') ), RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Wallet_Opportunity', ISPICKVAL(Wallet_Opportunity_Type__c,'Dapp Discovery Browsers'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Compliance_Status__c , 'Pass') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to move to Signed stage or beyond, PASS value is required if Wallet Opportunity Type = Dapp Discovery Browsers.
